snippet: A man’s fall from the Rockefeller Lookout, which is about a mile north of the George Washington Bridge, over the weekend was the third this summer.
abstract: Fatal fall from the Palisades is the third that has occurred in the summer of 2012, raising concerns about safety along the steep cliffs of the Hudson River; 26-year-old Artem Adzhyev of Brooklyn accidentally fell to his death from the Rockefeller Lookout along the Palisades Parkway in Englewood Cliffs, NJ.
lead_paragraph: A man’s fall from the Rockefeller Lookout, which is about a mile north of the George Washington Bridge, over the weekend was the third this summer.

headline.seo: Third Fatal Fall From Palisades This Summer Raises Safety Concerns
headline.main: Fatal Fall From Palisades Raises Concerns on Safety
headline.print_headline: Fatal Fall From Palisades Raises Concerns on Safety
